slot.description: Which column the missions will appear in. 1 to 5.

generic.description: Whether missions within this series are considered generic.

ai.description: Whether the AI will claim missions in this series.

has_country_shield.description: Whether to display the country shield on the icon.

potential_on_load.description: Determines whether a series is loaded at all. Used to limit series to DLC.

potential.description: Determines when a series appears for a country. Country scope.
